Flow.description:
Flow Description: Triggers Marketing Cloud Comms for Pre-Approval Opportunities and is launched from the Wrap Up Opportunity H2 flow
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: smartServiceTemplateSelection
formulas.expression: CASE({!theselectedTemplate}, "PA - no answer" , "SSPA_E01_PAlead_noanswer" , "PA - sending consent form (spoke to client)" , "SSPA_E02_PAlead_sendingconsentform_spoketoclient" , "Consent form reminder - follow up" , "SSPA_E03_Consentformsent_followup" , "Credit check positive - requesting docs to complete PA (Documents Required)" , "SSPA_E04_CreditCheckPositive_requestingdocsforPA" , "PA requested - docs follow up" , "SSPA_E05_PArequested_awaitingdocsfollow_up" , "FHB PA - No Answer" , "SSFHB_E01_PALead_Noanswer" , "FHB PA - sending consent form (spoke to client)" , "SSFHB_E02_PALead_Spoketoclient" , "FHB Consent form reminder - follow up" , "SSFHB_E03_PALead_Consentformsent_followup" , "FHB Credit check positive - requesting docs to complete PA (Documents Required)" , "SSFHB_E04_CreditCheckPositive_requestingdocsforPA" , "FHB PA requested - docs follow up" , "SSFHB_E05_PArequested_awaitingdocsfollow_up" , "No Template Selected" )

formulas.name: templateSelection
formulas.expression: CASE({!theselectedTemplate}, "PA - no answer" , "BBPA_E01_PAlead_noanswer" , "PA - sending consent form (spoke to client)" , "BBPA_E02_PAlead_sendingconsentform_spoketoclient" , "Consent form reminder - follow up" , "BBPA_E03_Consentformsent_followup" , "Credit check positive - requesting docs to complete PA (Documents Required)" , "BBPA_E04a_CreditCheckPositive_requestingdocsforPA" , "Poor credit - post conversation" , "BBPA_E04b_Poorcreditcheck_postconversation" , "PA requested - docs follow up" , "BBPA_E05_PArequested_awaitingdocsfollow_up" , "PA issued - awaiting OTP (attach PA certificate)" , "BBPA_E06_PAissued_awaitingOTP_attachedPAcert" , "FHB PA - No Answer" , "BBFHB_E01_PALead_Noanswer" , "FHB PA - sending consent form (spoke to client)" , "BBFHB_E02_PALead_Spoketoclient" , "FHB Consent form reminder - follow up" , "BBFHB_E03_PALead_Consentformsent_followup" , "FHB Credit check positive - requesting docs to complete PA (Documents Required)" , "BBFHB_E04a_CreditCheckPositive_requestingdocsforPA" , "FHB Poor credit - post conversation" , "BBFHB_E04b_Poorcreditcheck_postconversation" , "FHB PA requested - docs follow up" , "BBFHB_E06_PArequested_awaitingdocsfollow_up" , "FHB PA issued - awaiting OTP (attach PA certificate)" , "BBFHB_E05_PAissued_sendingPACert_awaitingOTP" , "No Template Selected" )

fields.name: loanApplicantsDoNotExist
fields.fieldText: Loan Applicants do not exist for this opportunity

fields.name: loanApplicantsDoNotExist_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
The email address has not been populated for customer (Co Applicant) {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.Last_Name__c}.


Please capture the missing information on the customer's Person Account.


The email will only be sent to Main Applicant {!Get_Person_Account.FirstName} {!Get_Person_Account.LastName}.

fields.name: blockIssuePAMail
fields.fieldText:
A PA must be issued in order to send the below email:

{!theselectedTemplate}

fields.name: marriedCOPFail
fields.fieldText:
Credit Report not available for Co-Applicant.


The marital agreement for the main applicant is Married in Community of Property.


A credit report must be generated for the Co-Applicant in order to proceed.

fields.name: marriedCOPFail_0
fields.fieldText:
A Credit Report is not available for the Main Applicant or Co-Applicant.


A credit report must be generated in order to proceed.

fields.name: loanApplicantsDoNotExist_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
A Credit Report is not available for Co-Applicant {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.Last_Name__c}.


A credit report must be generated in order to proceed with the email send.

fields.name: loanApplicantsDoNotExist_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
A Credit Report is not available for Co Applicant {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.Last_Name__c}


A credit report must be generated in order to proceed with the email send to the Co Applicant.


The email will only be sent to Main Applicant {!Get_Main_Loan_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Loan_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

textTemplates.name: chatterPostMessage
textTemplates.text:
<---- Customer Email Sent ---->
Template Selection: {!theselectedTemplate}
Sent To: {!accountFullName}
Sent From: @[{!$User.Id}]
Sent Date: {!sentTime}
